lead_paragraph: In this pitching-heavy postseason, the news media have heaped hype on the top playoff hurlers. Roy Halladay, Cole Hamels, Matt Cain and now Madison Bumgarner have all been given their due 15 minutes of fame for dominating in the postseason. And despite a shaky last outing, everyone seems to presume a Texas victory in Cliff Lee's starts.
snippet: How the Rangers can beat Tim Lincecum.

headline.main: Keeping Score: How the Rangers Can Beat Lincecum

abstract: How the Rangers can beat Tim Lincecum.
